page.title: 02LANDSCAPE 2: BUILDINGS
page.content: {HIGH ST.}- Methodist Church 1871, Sunday School 1854 (now Village Hall), Hill House C17th (rebuilt 1819), Stone Bower 1837, Manor 1746 ( formerly Courthouse), Bull Farm 1669 ( formerly Old Black Bull, Constable Cottage 1824, North House 1837. {DUKE ST.}- Hollins House 1720. {LOW ST.}- Tatham House Cl7th & C18th, Orchard Cottage 1724, Fountain House C18th ( formerly Fountain of Youth). {LEEMING LANE}- Donkin House late C16th. Modern development includes two groups of Council houses on the Ireby Road, privately owned houses and bungalows and old peoples' bungalows on the Croft, new property on Burton Hill and along the river bank and, most recently, on Manor Park.
